data.comment: Bruno Arleu starts the match. Internacional with the kick-off in Belo Horizonte.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Hyoran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bruno Arleu awards Internacional a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 3, In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Guilherme Arana. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Internacional at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro are caught offside.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
Yuri Alberto for Internacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Internacional move into a 0-1 lead through a Yuri Alberto header.
Great play from Marcos Guilherme to set up the goal.
In the minute 11, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Own goal in Belo Horizonte! Damian Musto scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 17, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Goal kick for Internacional at Independencia.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 18, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte, Allan of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 20, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional.
Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Keno, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Damian Musto for Internacional has been booked by Bruno Arleu and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 26, Bruno Arleu signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Marcos Guilherme (Internacional) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Internacional at Independencia.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 30, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Belo Horizonte, Atletico Mineiro push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bruno Arleu signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 36, Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 38, In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Independencia, Yuri Alberto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Vargas is whistled for offside at Independencia.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Arleu awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Eduardo Vargas of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional.
Atletico Mineiro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Internacional.
In the minute 43, Igor Rabello (Atletico Mineiro) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
Leandro Fernandez (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 45, Internacional to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
At Independencia the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Vargas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Internacional have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Belo Horizonte.
Atletico Mineiro have kicked-off the second half at Independencia.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 46, Rodrigo Lindoso is replacing Damian Musto for Internacional at Independencia.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 50, Bruno Arleu signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
At Independencia, Internacional are penalized for being offside.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 54, Bruno Arleu awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 57, Atletico Mineiro surge into the attack at Independencia but Eduardo Sasha’s header is off-target.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 58, In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lucas Ribeiro is booked for the away team.
In the minute 60, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Abel Braga (Internacional) is making a second substitution, with Praxedes replacing Rodrigo Dourado.
Goal! A Hyoran header gives Atletico Mineiro a 2-1 lead in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 61, Keno with an assist there.
Throw-in Internacional.
Thiago Galhardo is replacing Leandro Fernandez for the away team.
In the minute 64, Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
In the minute 65, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Eduardo Sasha with Alan Franco.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Thiago Galhardo for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Thiago Galhardo of Internacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 75, Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Abel Braga is making the team's fourth substitution at Independencia with Mauricio replacing Marcos Guilherme.
In the minute 76, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Peglow is on a sub for Yuri Alberto for Internacional.
Rodrigo Lindoso (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Federico Zaracho replacing Hyoran.
In the minute 77, The home team have replaced Eduardo Vargas with Marrony. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Internacional.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Internacional are whistled for offside.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Internacional are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Keno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 84, Atletico Mineiro’s Keno is on his feet again at Independencia.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Arleu awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a fourth change, with Nathan replacing the possibly injured Keno.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Praxedes (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Peglow levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 89, Bruno Arleu signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Alan Franco. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Internacional at Independencia.
Free kick Internacional.
Internacional's Peglow gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
Peglow (Internacional) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
